prod_short_desc: Defend the mission and dodge a surprise in the jungle!
prod_long_desc:
Explore what lies within the LEGO® City jungle on a Jungle Halftrack Mission, featuring a truck with tracks on the back wheels, storage space for the chain and tool elements, plus an ATV with removable crate, a buildable campfire and a buildable temple with diamond element and moveable stone that releases a spider. Includes 2 minifigures, plus panther and spider figures.
Build a Half-Track Truck for tough jungle missions, along with an ATV and extra Jungle Temple mini-build!
Includes 2 minifigures: 1 male and 1 female Jungle Explorer, plus panther and spider figures
LEGO City building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Half-Track Truck measures over 3” high, 5” long, and 2” wide
378 pieces – For boy and girls between the ages of 6 and 12 years old
